templates.name: Price matching
templates.content: Please note that the price listed online doesn't necessarily have to match the price in stores. Unfortunately, we don't offer price matches for our online site.

templates.name: Restock? (autosend enabled)
templates.content: I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend checking our website and social media frequently.

templates.name: What is the shelf-life of the products?
templates.content: The shelf life of all our products is at least 2+ months. If products sent are too close to the expiration date or there are any issues, please let us know!

templates.name: Retroactive discount requests
templates.content: Thanks for the purchase! The fastest way to have this applied retroactively is to email at support@flockfoods.com and our team will take care of that for you.

templates.name: Do your tents come with a stove jack?
templates.content: Yes, they do. Our stove jacks have been made keeping your safety in mind. The tents come with a heat-resistant, silicone-coated stove jack with 5" & 6" pre-cut patterns. We've considered all the potential hazards and the stove jack is completely safe to use with a stove.

templates.name: What's your spiciest flavor?
templates.content: Honey Sriracha is our spiciest flavor!

templates.name: Do you offer samples?
templates.content: We don't have samples available, but we do have a refund policy if you're not satisfied with our products.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here - https://flockfoods.com/pages/refund-policy

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://flockfoods.com/pages/store-locator

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 48 business hours and we usually ship via USPS, DHL, FedEx, or other couriers such as LaserShip and OnTrac. Once shipped, it will take 4-6 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: Missing products on the order
templates.content: If you're missing part of your order it likely means the rest is just a day or two behind as each box ships separately. Please email us at support@flockfoods.com if it still hasn't arrived in the next day or two.

templates.name: Free Shipping
templates.content: You can use the code FREESHIP for free shipping on the entire order, but you can't stack that with other codes.

templates.name: Post purchase issues
templates.content: The fastest way to get help with orders is to reach out to our team via email at: support@flockfoods.com Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Where are your products sourced / manufactured / made?
templates.content: We actually work with local farmers and suppliers across the US.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you?

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/accounts/login/?next=/flock.foods/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/FlockChickenChips

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@flockfoods.com Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at support@flockfoods.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at partnerships@flockfoods.comOur team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: The fastest way to get help with orders is to reach out to our team via email at support@flockfoods.com. Our team is happy to help, if possible!

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: Unfortunately, our rewards program ended back in January. If you have any concerns, please reach out to us at support@flockfoods.com.

templates.name: Do you have silica / desiccant packets in your chips?
templates.content: Yes, we do have desiccant packets in some of our cases to keep the chips fresh. They're not meant for consumption and need to be thrown out prior to consumption.
